abstract: Follow along for live updates and analysis throughout the course of Game 1 of the World Series.
snippet: Follow along for live updates and analysis throughout the course of Game 1 of the World Series.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - After making a record 28 pitching changes in the N.L.C.S., Tony La Russa pulled the right levers with his bullpen on Wednesday night, making five more changes. They all went his way, and so the Cardinals took the first game of the 107th World Series, 3-2, in front of 46,406 at Busch Stadium. Read David Waldstein's full story here.

headline.main: Cardinals Take Game 1 of World Series
